column4: is it possible to remove the powerbutton from the lightdm, or how do i deny people to press it.
perhaps someone at askubuntu knows..  not seeing anything  exactly like it.. but heres some pointers http://askubuntu.com/search?q=lightdm+disable+shutdown&submit=search
theres some system wide autostart entries.. id find such a 'feature' annoying if i was a user.
i need it to show my users.
